channel.title: GoodData | Modern BI for the Modern Data Stack
channel.description: GoodData is a leading composable data and analytics platform. Build, embed, and scale analytics on demand, with zero vendor lock-in.

item.title: 21 Customer Service KPIs You Need to Track
item.description: Optimizing your customer service can increase customer loyalty, reduce costs, and increase revenue. Read this article for the top 21 KPI's for customer service.

item.title: User-Centered Design Vs. Design Thinking: Which is Best for Building Data Products?
item.description: Leveraging user-centered design thinking can help your team build effective data products that deliver actionable insights to end users.

item.title: Data Governance: All you need to know
item.description: Discover how effective data governance ensures quality, security, and accessibility, empowering businesses with reliable data for informed decision-making.

item.title: 4 Industry Examples of Leveraging Predictive Analytics
item.description: See how predictive analytics transforms industries, forecasts trends, and prevents losses with user-friendly insights.

item.title: Introducing the GoodWire Wireframing Library
item.description: Transform your prototyping with a comprehensive wireframing library for Figma. Designed for prototyping data analytics applications on the GoodData Platform.

item.title: Interactive Data Visualization: The Only Guide You Need
item.description: Interactive data visualizations enable users to engage with data. Learn how they offer flexibility in how to display your data.

item.title: Data Integration: Definition, Types, and Use-Cases
item.description: Learn how effective data integration merges diverse data sources into a unified view, enhancing decision-making and business intelligence.

item.title: Celebrate 25 Years of LEGO® Star Wars™!
item.description: Lightsabers, spaceships, and droids - LEGO® Star Wars™ has captured imaginations for 25 years. Let's explore the incredible success of the LEGO® Star Wars™!

item.title: Data Storytelling: 6 Tips To Help You Tell Effective Data Stories
item.description: Learn how to transform data into meaningful narratives that encourage data-driven action.

item.title: CSV Files in Analytics: Taming the Variability
item.description: Explore how Longbow integrates CSV file reading for analytics. Learn about CSV's benefits, challenges, and our solutions for efficient data handling.
